name: Jirachi
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: It is said to have the ability to grant any wish for just one week every thousand years.

abilities.name: Stellar Veil
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage counters from being placed on your Benched Pokémon by effects of attacks used by your opponent’s Basic Pokémon.

attacks.name: Charge Energy
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
